name: Ext_R2_Composition_se_mode
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.Composition.section.mode for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents Composition.section.mode from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Composition|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: How the entry list was prepared - whether it is a working list that is suitable for being maintained on an ongoing basis, or if it represents a snapshot of a list of items from another source, or whether it is a prepared list where items may be marked as added, modified or deleted.
element.comment: `Composition.section.mode` has no related element in R5:Composition
element.isModifierReason: This extension is a modifier because the target element Composition.section.mode is flagged IsModifier

element.definition: How the entry list was prepared - whether it is a working list that is suitable for being maintained on an ongoing basis, or if it represents a snapshot of a list of items from another source, or whether it is a prepared list where items may be marked as added, modified or deleted.
element.comment: `Composition.section.mode` has no related element in R5:Composition

binding.description: The processing mode that applies to this section.
